main event: A person and another individual were driving near Brewster, Ohio in June 1962 and noticed a metallic, disk-like object in the sky that was hovering and moving erratically. They watched it for 10-15 minutes before it suddenly shot straight up and disappeared.
interesting points: The object appeared to be the size of a large automobile and was several hundred feet in the air.
The object's movement was described as erratic, hovering, and then suddenly shooting straight up.
The witness had been interested in the UFO phenomenon and frequently went out to areas where sightings had been reported.
The case was obtained from confidential sources by Mr. _____.
